title: Disgraced former 'Today' host Matt Lauer has finally resurfaced — in his daughter's TikTok videos
text:
Nearly two years after he was fired from NBC's "Today" show, former anchor Matt Lauer returns to the public eye — in his daughter's TikTok videos.

Lauer can be seen lip-syncing and dancing in videos made by his 14-year-old daughter, Romy Lauer, on TikTok, appearing as a "goofy dad" figure.

The disgraced news anchor was fired from the newscast amid allegations of "inappropriate sexual behavior" at work in November 2017.

Nearly two years after he was fired from NBC's "Today" show, former anchor Matt Lauer returns to the public eye — in his daughter's TikTok videos.

Lauer can be seen lip-syncing and dancing in videos made by his 14-year-old daughter, Romy Lauer, on TikTok, appearing as a "goofy dad" figure. In one video, Lauer is seen attempting a dance that is popular among users on the app.

Romy Lauer posted a video featuring her dad, saying, "Famous relative check," as part of the trend of TikTok users showing proof of their relations to celebrities and well-known figures.

In another video, Lauer is seen mimicking Thanos and his notorious finger snap from a scene in "Avengers: Infinity War."

—Barstool News Network (@BarstoolNewsN) October 8, 2019

Sexual allegations against the former news anchor first arose in 2017, including that he had exposed himself, made lewd comments to female colleagues, and even used a security device to lock women in his office with him. The disgraced news anchor was fired from the newscast for "inappropriate sexual behavior" at work in November 2017.

"Some of what is being said about me is untrue or mischaracterized, but there is enough truth in these stories to make me feel embarrassed and ashamed," Lauer wrote in an apology after making an abrupt departure from "Today," adding, "Repairing the damage will take a lot of time and soul searching and I'm committed to beginning that effort. It is now my full-time job."

Lauer attempted to make a comeback to the spotlight last year, but reportedly gave up on the endeavor months later. He has since kept a low profile in the media, making a few headlines pertaining to his divorce from ex-wife Annette Roque, which was finalized last month, or being spotted on vacation with his children.
